Over 100 enemies and 20 savage levels are yours to conquer alongside a CD-quality soundtrack by award winning composer Tommy Tallarico! Soar through the air on a sky bike with enemies above and below you! You must put the forces of good and evil back in balance! Pray you are dreaming!

100305.name: Spider-Man: Return of the Sinister Six
100305.description:
In the game the player controls Spider-Man through six side-scrolling levels, with a member of the Sinister Six at the end of each level as a boss. The famous super-hero could jump, punch, kick, climb certain walls, shoot unlimited webs to swing on and collect web fluid to shoot square, web projectives. Players can also duck, and perform a jump kick.

The levels were generally pretty straight forward side-scrolling action, although occasionally a particular item such as key or a detonator would have to be found. Each level started out with a graphic illustration of Spider-Man battling the supervillain that the player would fight as a boss.

Spider-Man has only one life (in the NES version), although you do receive one continue. While there are web cartridge icons scattered throughout certain levels, (allowing Spider-Man to shoot ten web projectiles) there are no icons available to restore energy. However, defeating several enemies can restore Spider-Man's power bar.

Source: Wikipedia, "Spider-Man: Return of the Sinister Six", available under the CC-BY-SA License.

100306.name: Find the Kirillian!
100306.description:
From the back cover:

You are an Interplanetary Spy. Your mission is to capture Phatax, the Kirillian. He is a ruthless criminal who has stolen the Royal Jewels of the planet Alvare and kidnapped its young prince. You must recover the jewels and bring Phatax back alive!

100307.name: The Galactic Pirate
100307.description:
From the back cover:

You are an Interplanetary Spy. Your mission is to capture Marko Khen, the Galactic Pirate. Marko and his band of criminals have been kidnapping animals and turning them into monsters. You must recover the animals and smash Marko's sinister plans.

100308.name: Robot World
100308.description:
From the back cover:

You are an Interplanetary Spy. Your mission is to track down Dr. Cyberg, computer genius. He is the only person who can help you stop the rebellion on Robot World before it spreads to the rest of the galaxy!

100309.name: Space Olympics
100309.description:
From the back cover:

You are an Interplanetary Spy. Your mission is to travel to the first Space Olympics and protect the superathlete Andromeda. Gresh the evil master spy plans to kidnap her and sabotage the Olympics. You must make sure that Andromeda completes the Olympics alive!

100310.name: Van Helsing
100310.description:
User Summary

Evil has one name to fear - Van Helsing! In Transylvania, the monsters of man's deepest nightmares take form. One man's destiny - and curse - is to vanquish evil and destroy the all too real and lethal Count Dracula - none other than the legendary monster hunter Van Helsing! As Van Helsing, you will fight a plethora of creatures with a combination of deadly weapons, abilities and courage!

100312.name: Monsters of Doorna
100312.description:
From the back cover:

You are an Interplanetary Spy. Your mission is to fly the experimental X-wing starship to the planet of Doorna. Monsters have taken over the planet and you must restore peace!

100313.name: The Star Crystal
100313.description:
From the back cover:

You are an Interplanetary Spy. Your mission is to protect the diplomat Quarboss Tro as he travels with the most valuable jewel in the galaxy, the Star Crystal. You must stop unknown agents from stealing the crystal and attacking Tro!

100314.name: Rebel Spy
100314.description:
From the back cover:

You are the hero of your own science fiction adventure!

Can you get past an angry alien guard dog?

Or capture Valeeta, the notorious Rebel Spy?

You make the decisions!

100315.name: Mission to Microworld
100315.description:
From the back cover:

You are the hero of your own science fiction adventure!

Can you reach Microworld?

Or capture Electron, the planet's dictator?

You make the decisions!

100318.name: The Red Rocket
100318.description:
From the back cover:

You are the hero of your own science fiction adventure!

Can you get past Orbyn, the rebel robot leader?

Or discover the secret of Spy Center?

You make the decisions!

100319.name: Skystalker
100319.description:
From the back cover:

You are the hero of your own science fiction adventure!

Can you find the galaxy's most wanted thief?

Or escape his underground hideaway?

You make the decisions!

100320.name: Spongebob Squarepants: Featuring Nicktoons: Globs of Doom
100320.description:
SpongeBob SquarePants featuring Nicktoons: Globs Of Doom is a video game; the fourth installament in the Nicktoons Unite! series. Characters from SpongeBob SquarePants, Danny Phantom, The Adventures of Jimmy Neutron: Boy Genius, Tak and the Power of Juju and Invader Zim appear.

One seemingly normal day, SpongeBob and Squidward were on their way to work when huge asteroids started raining down on Bikini Bottom. A huge drop of goo fell on Squidward, causing the top part of his face to turn orange and becomes a cyclops of sorts. He becomes a zombie, chasing SpongeBob around the perimeter of someone's house until Patrick intervenes. Jimmy Neutron then arrives to take them to the Mawgu lair. Soon, the gooey creatures spawning from the asteroids start taking over Bikini Bottom...

Source: Wikipedia, "SpongeBob SquarePants featuring Nicktoons: Globs of Doom", available under the CC-BY-SA License.

100321.description:
The hare and tortoise are staging a series of races! This an asymmetric 2 player climbing race game using the Decktet system. Even though the players must shed the same amount of cards, the Hare is given much more to use (and is more free to use them) at the start of the game, but the Tortoise will slowly and steadily build up her hand.

The card play like climbing games is in response to the opponent's plays, but it is also constrained because the players must always connect their plays with their developing race tracks. The winner with the best record after four races is the champion badger!

Full rules may be found on wiki.decktet.com
100321.name: If Badger was a Bunny

100322.name: Ultraheroes
100322.description:
From the back cover:

You are the hero of your own science fiction adventure!

Can you find the traitor in the galaxy's newest superteam?

Or help defeat Kort, enemy of Spy Center?

You make the decisions!

100323.name: Planet Hunters
100323.description:
From the back cover:

You are the hero of your own science fiction adventure!

Can you infiltrate the starship of the world's most dangerous villains?

Or survive the dangers of an aquatic frontier?

You make the decisions!

100324.name: Fantasy Handouts: Menus
100324.description:
Publisher Blurb:

Menus, the latest release in the series, presents three menus that GMs can use for inns and taverns in their campaign. Each menu offers a different selection of foods and drinks (and at different prices) . . . just like in the real world! GMs can also use these menus as inspiration for menus of their own creation.

100325.name: Fantasy Handouts: Menus 2
100325.description:
Publisher Blurb:

Menus 2 presents three more menus that GMs can use for inns and taverns in their campaign. Created by Michael Hammes.

This supplement is systemless and suitable for almost any fantasy campaign.

100326.name: Fantasy Handouts: Pardons
100326.description:
Publisher Blurb:

Pardons provides GMs with three different pardons, the perfect document for a party of players in trouble with the law. All three pardons are presented with both a background and without, so that GMs may print either the document as we've designed it or onto special paper. Additionally, one of the pardons is written in a "wizard's script" that cannot be read. For those characters that can read the language, however, we have included a second version of the same document in plain english.

100327.name: Fantasy Handouts: Ransom Notes
100327.description:
Publisher Blurb:

Ransom Notes is a collection of six different -- fully customizable! -- ransom notes. Presented in both a color, graphics-heavy version and a simple B&W version, each ransom note can be edited in Acrobat Reader. Change the names. Change the demands. Change the locations. With just a few moments of work any of of these ransom notes is customized for your campaign!

100328.name: Fantasy Handouts: Wanted Posters
100328.description:
Publisher Blurb:

Wanted Posters, the first release in the series, presents six wanted posters for individuals wanted dead or alive for murder, theft, arson, and other crimes. Each poster lists the villain's crimes, how much he is worth, and who the players can visit in order to collect the reward.

100329.name: Fantasy Handouts: Wanted Posters 2
100329.description:
Publisher Blurb:

Wanted Posters 2 presents seven wanted posters for individuals wanted dead or alive for murder, theft, identity theft, and other crimes. Each poster lists the villain's crimes, how much he or she is worth, and who the players can visit in order to collect the reward.

100330.name: Fantasy Handouts: Wanted Posters 3
100330.description:
Publisher Blurb:

Wanted Posters 3 takes things up a notch, presenting six criminals with prices on their heads of up to 5,000 gold. Each poster lists the villain's crimes, how much he or she is worth, and where to collect the reward.

Includes two versions of each poster.

100331.name: MLB SlugFest 20-04
100331.description:
User Summary

Baseball game with a more "Street" rules set to it. Ability to attack other players, unlike most baseball games.

100332.name: Atari 2600 Paddle Controller
100332.description:
A paddle is a game controller with a round wheel and one or more fire buttons, where the wheel is typically used to control movement of the player object along one axis of the video screen. A paddle controller rotates through a fixed arc (usually about 330 degrees); it has a stop at each end.

Atari 2600 Paddle controllers come in pairs both connecting to a single controller port. These controllers also rotate just under one full rotation before hitting a hard stop. Finally, they have a picture of a tennis racquet and the word "paddle" on it. Because two controllers connect to each port and the 2600 has two controller ports, four players simultaneously can play in games that support it.

Design

The paddle wheel is usually mechanically coupled to a potentiometer, so as to generate an output voltage level varying with the wheel's angle relative to a fixed reference position. A paddle is thus an absolute position controller. That is, without any previous knowledge, the sensor can be read and the result directly indicates the position of the paddle knob. This is in contrast to a quadrature encoder-based device or "spinner".

Games

Some famous video games using paddles are Pong, Breakout, and Night Driver. The reason for the name paddles for this type of game controller is that the first game that used it, Pong, was a video game simulation of table tennis, whose racquets are commonly called paddles. Even though the simulated paddles appeared on-screen (as small line segments), it was the hand controllers used to move the line segments that actually came to bear the name.

Source: Wikipedia, "Paddle (game controller)", available under the CC-BY-SA License.

100333.description:
Pass safely through the traffic! Policeman Paul help players: There are many different picture cards to for close examination. Whoever assesses the traffic situation correctly will move ahead. Traffic lights, zebra crossings, footpaths and road game - this game teaches children how to behave in traffic and gain independence.

---

German Box Back
Sicher durch den Verkehr! Polizist Paul hilft spielerisch dabei: Viele verschiedene Bildkarten regen zum genauen Hinsehen an. Wer die Verkehrs-Situationen richtig einschätzt, kommt gut voran. Ampel, Zebrastreifen, Fußweg und Spielstraße - mit diesem Spiel lernen Kinder das richtige Verhalten im Verkehr und gewinnen an Selbstständigkeit
100333.name: Sicher ans Ziel

100336.name: The Secret of Blue Water
100336.description:
User Summary

The title literally translates to "Nadia of the Mysterious Seas", although the English title used for the series by the Japanese is "The Secret of Blue Water".

Taken from the manual:

[original japanese]

汝は冒険者か。　危険という名の滝をくぐり抜け、その奥に、伝説の正体を求める者か。ならば、我を求めよ。

時に１８８９年。

今から１００年ほど前の昔、沈みゆくノーチラス、キングはとある無人島に漂着し、数々の困難を克服しながら、子供だけの気ままなその日暮らしをしていました。 しかし、ジャンがコツコツと築きあげた一大科学文明も一夜の嵐によってあつけなく崩壊してしまったのです。 ところが「禍福はあざなえる縄のごとし」の例えどおりに、嵐はジャン達の前に巨大な島も運んできてくれたのです。 その島で懐かしい、エアトンやグランヂイス、サンソン、ハンソンの３人組に再会したジャン達は食料が豊富なグランヂイス達の島に移り住むことに決めました。

やがて、この島にはおかしなことがいくつもあることがわかります。 中でも最大の謎は、この島は動いているということでした。 動く島での生活にも落ち着いたある日、この島は不思議な島の前で止まってしまいます。 ジャン達はその島に上陸し、調べてみることにしました。 この島には一体どんな秘密があるのでしょうか。 そして、ナヂイアは一体何を考えて生きているのでしょうか。

[translated]

Art thou an adventurer? Someone who would know the truth of the legend no matter the danger? If so, follow!

Year: 1889

100 years ago after the sinking of the Nautilus, the castaways, along with King, after many hard times, were living a carefree life on a deserted island. However, the island "civilization" that Jean had built piece by piece using his knowledge of science, was destroyed overnight by a storm. "Sometimes from misfortune comes luck" for the storm also carried a huge island before Jean and the others. On this island, Jean and the others met up with their old friends Aryton, Grandis, Samson, and Hanson. The food was abundant so they decided to stay.

Over time they noticed many strange things about the island. The strangest of all was that island was moving! One day after they had all settled down to life on a moving island, the island stops in front of a new and mysterious island. Jean and the others decided to land on this new island and explore it. What kind of secret will they discover on this new island? Meanwhile, Nadia is thinking to herself "Now what?!"

100337.name: Calm Before the Storm
100337.description:
Adventure description from front page:

Tension runs high in and around Safeton since the Narwell attacks left many brutally slain. The Pomarj is a flurry of activity and the high seas are once again rife with danger. Whisperings of the Mak making his move, numerous disappearances in the middle of the night, and most disturbing of all, sightings of ships sailing the yellow flags sets the entire region on edge. This adventure is a loosely sequel of "COR5-12 Return to the Undercity" and "COR5-05 A Marked Man". A one-round Core adventure set in the Wild Coast and the Orcish Empire of the Pomarj for characters level 1 - 15 (APLs 2 - 12)

100338.name: The Price of Power
100338.description:
Adventure description from front page:

Ages ago a lone group of monks sought the secrets of the mind. Time has almost removed them from the knowledge of Oerth. Scattered tales and misremembered legends still encourage some to seek the lost treasures and knowledge of these monks. Will you tempt fate and search for the monastery? This adventure is a continuation of the "Tome of Clarity and Mists" series. An adventure for characters level 1 - 17.

100339.name: All Roads Lead to Rauxes
100339.description:
Adventure description from front page:

"When there is no more room in Acheron, the dead shall dwell upon the Oerth. . ." -- Battle Hymns of the Herald, Scriptures of Hextor.
From the border barony of Stel , pursuit of the Footmen leads towards the magical wasteland that was once Rauxes, Capital of the Great Kingdom. To even penetrate the magical veil that surrounds the wasteland is a feat, thus it is not something you or your enemies would do lightly. Whatever waits on the other side will be extremely powerful and deadly, but answers and results never come free for a true (anti)hero.
A two-round adventure for APL 6 - 12 and not for the faint of heart.
Part five in the "Running with the Baatezu" series.

100340.name: Tokyo Brain Pop
100340.description:
From the Publisher's Website:

Welcome to Atarashi high school, where schoolgirls with destructive psychic powers do battle against bloodthirsty ghosts, demon princes stalk the school halls and the only thing worse than losing your soul is letting your grades slip! Panty Explosion Perfect is a brand new edition of the award winning psychic school girl role playing game by Jake Richmond and Matt Schlotte.

100342.description:
Quick Quest distills dungeon delving into its basic elements: killing monsters and looting treasure. Level up you heroes, equip your items, and venture deeper into the dungeon. Can your party survive to level 10? If they do there's a nasty boss and evil minions waiting there for you.

Designed for solo play but easily adapted to multiplayer, Quick Quest is a fast-paced fantasy card and dice game that only takes about 30 minutes to play.

You might not always have time enough for an RPG but there's always time for a Quick Quest.

Includes:
Hero Cards Deck (8 cards)
Treasure Deck (43 cards)
Quest Treasure Deck (17 cards)
Monster Deck (68 cards)
Quick Quest Rules Document
1 D12 (17mm) - Random Color
2 D6 (16mm) - Black
2 D6 (16mm) - Blue
2 D6 (16mm) - Red
3 D6 (16mm) - White
2 D6 (16mm) - Yellow
25 Poker Chips (22mm) - Red
100342.name: Quick Quest

100343.name: Les cinq Dalton
100343.description:
The batlle continues between the lonesome cowboy and the most notorious outlaws in the West. This game is a battle of wits, with Lucky Luke and his faithful steed Jolly Jumper on one side, and the Dalton brothers and Ma Dalton on the other.

The game consists of a plastic board, 8 squares by 8, on which are placed 64 counters. The orange counters represent Lucky Luke and Jolly Jumper. The purple counters the Dalton brothers and Ma Dalton.

Rules: the game is for 2 players. The aim is to get 5 counters in a row (4 Lucky Luke + Jolly Jumper or 4 Daltons + Ma Dalton)
Each player puts down one counter at a time, and his opponent must try to stop him making a line, ath the same time gaining points himself. each complete line is worth 1 point, and the player with the highest number of points is the winner

100344.name: Hyper Rails
100344.description:
User Summary

Hyper Rails (advanced 3d rollercoaster design) is a roller coaster construction and simulation game developed and released by Pantera Entertainment in 2002.

100345.name: Action Man: Raid on Island X
100345.description:
Translation from the box (Dutch edition)

Dr. X kindnapped animals from all over the world for his vile experiments. Help Action Man in finding Dr. X and stopping his evil plans. In doing so, you must take on Dr. X's helpers such as Professor Gangrene, Plague Locust and a robt version of Dr. X. To beat your enemies and stop Dr. X, you must search the bases on the island and use all your Action Man skills. Dr. X must be stopped!

- Featuring Action Man clothing, vehicles and gear.
- Play six tutorial adventures to get ready for the real challenges
- Take on activities such as scuba diving, climbing mountains and bungee jumping
- Explore five exciting locations

100347.name: Action Man: Jungle Storm
100347.description:
Translation from the back of the box (Dutch edition)

A secret agent disappeared mysteriously on a tropical island. Action Man has to investigate the case and needs you to help him. Follow the trace through the dark jungle, under water and through volcanic areas. On your way you'll have to face Dr. X's helpers like the infamous Professor gangrene, Kraken, Imperial Dragon and more. Use your enormous equipment arsenal and extreme skills to stop Dr. X and save the world.

Features:
- 20 missions
- Exciting activities such as para dropping, deep sea diving and skateboarding
- Train your missions in the headquarters and Action Man's gym
- Create an Action Man comic book
- Print colourful badges and certificates

100348.name: Tod in Valantia
100348.description:
(from the back of the book)
Sidor Valantis, the roaring metropolis at the Valant Sea, is known for its colorful mixture of people and their extravagant lifestyle. Especially in "Sang", the days of the year in which Raia is honored and the streets are filled with revelers. The days that culminate each year in the splendid, pompous Raia festival.
This year again there is a lively atmosphere when the heroes arrive in Sidor Valantis, but plans to enjoy the raucous festival are soon forgotten, for death comes to in Valantia! A series of highly unusual deaths draws the hero in a current of dangerous intrigue, lust and revenge that drives them right through the confusing streets and canals of Rumakra. Finally the task to prevent more victims becomes more compelling as they themselves come under suspicion of being involved in the incidents and have to fear for their lives.

100349.name: Characters of the Untamed Empires
100349.description:
From Introduction:

Every game has its quirks, neat things that you can do with a character. And every game has its limits. What I'm hoping to do over the next bunch of pages is walk through the creation of a gaming group, five 100 Karma starting characters representing the five archetypes that most people want to play.

They're Untamed Empires characters, created using nothing more than the Suzerain Rule Book, the feats in The Great Below, and fleshed out with a little help from the Untamed Empires Weapons supplement. Together, they'll be ready for the adventure from The Great Below, and ready for a great future of development towards Hero level.

100350.name: Dr. Ballard, I Presume
100350.description:
From Introduction:

In this scenario the characters have just started work for a secret supernatural intelligence agency within the government. You know the sort, where wizards use illusion spells to allow their cyber-enhanced SWAT team to get to their target undetected. Except that the characters are newbies, and not very skilled. They don’t fling fireballs or walk through walls. So they’ll need cunning on their first mission instead. And since they’re actually double agents, they’ll need lots of cunning! Good luck to them.

100351.name: Im Namen des Thearchen
100351.description:
(user summary)
This is a collection of three short adventures in Myranor:

Tod eines Drepaniers (in Eshbathmar)

Alter Hass (in the archipelago of Shindrabar)

Totentanz (as a spinoff of "Spur des Sternenprinzen")
